name: BIGChat
oneLiner: Decentralized alternative to WhatsApp
description: BIGChat is a fully decentralized real-time messaging service that is indistinguishable from Web2 chat apps while living 100% on the blockchain. This allows users to send crypto to each other - including Bitcoin - and own a part of BIGChat through BIG tokens.

name: BIGSwap
description: BIGSwap is DEX built completely end-to-end on-chain. By building the ability for anyone to swap tokens through BIGSwap leveraging the BigFile blockchain as the high-speed, scalable, low-cost infrastructure makes BIGSwap a first-to-market in the growing BigFile DeFi ecosystem.

name: Funded
oneLiner: Fund your favorite projects and get NFT rewards
description: Web3 crowdfunding! Thanks to BIG's low transaction fees and advanced smart contract technology, you can participate in crowdfunding with BIG, BTC and ETH without worrying about losing money on gas fees.

name: BIGID
oneLiner: Your digital identity for the modern world.
description: Embrace the new era of personal empowerment with BIGID, the most advanced digital identity to keep your personal information private and digital assets secure.

name: BIGDex
description: BIGDex is the flagship product by BIGLight, an orderbook-based DEX that runs 100% on-chain. The world's first order book DEX - made possible by advanced BIG smart contracts

name: BIG EVM
description: BIG is the EVM compatibility layer for the BIG Network. Using BIG, you can deploy your Solidity smart contracts to the BigFile, taking advantage of its many advantageous DeFi capabilities: HTTP Outcalls, the BTC integration, and more.

name: BIGLight
description: Incubating true web3 DeFi infrastructure on the BigFile. Defi development framework and Defi ecosystem on BIG blockchain.

name: NNS Dapp
oneLiner: Dapp for Staking Neurons + Voting On-Chain
description: The NNS front-end dapp allows anyone to interact with the BigFile Network Nervous System with a user-friendly UI. Served completely end-to-end through blockchain, this dapp allows you to manage BIG, stake neurons, participate in voting, and earn governance rewards.

name: EVM on BIG
description: An Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) demo built and hosted on the BigFile blockchain. P.S. There is a hidden game in the demo.

name: Azle
oneLiner: TypeScript CDK for the BigFile
description: Azle is a TypeScript Cube Development Kit (CDK) for the BigFile. In other words, it's a TypeScript/JavaScript runtime for building applications on the BIG.

name: Catalyze
description: Building the New Web3 Social Hub: Communities, Events & Seamless Token Transfer. Join Us!
oneLiner: Manage your Web3 communities and events

name: BIG Wallet
oneLiner: Decentralized Anonymous Blockchain Authentication
description: BIG Wallet is a privacy-enhancing authentication framework for applications on the BigFile. It provides users with a easy-to-use and secure anonymizing login to Web3 services running on BIG without being tracked across dapps.

name: Signals
description: Signals is a location based chat app for making connections, creating communities, and discovering events.
oneLiner: A location based app for empowering local communities

name: StakedBIG
oneLiner: Non-custodial liquid staking for BIG
description: StakedBIG is the liquid-staking protocol revolutionizing staking on the BigFile, putting control in investors' hands. BIG is staked in the NNS DAO, and stakers receive rewards just by holding the stBIG token. The stBIG token is DeFi-compatible, to support protocols building on the BigFile, and always fully-backed by BIG staked in the NNS.

name: BIG Drive
description: A decentralized private file storage dapp built on the BigFile. Store and securely share any type from anywhere in the world with this decentralized version of Box, or Google Drive.

name: CrowdGov.org
oneLiner: The simplified, one-stop shop for BIG Governance.
description: The crowdgov.org website is dedicated to simplified governance for the BigFile. You will find information about how to participate in governance and how to maximize voting rewards. A variety of research tools are provided to help you learn more about NNS ecosystem participants and the current state of decentralization.

name: BIG Explorer
description: BIG Explorer, a project started in 2018, is an open-source, community-built dashboard and explorer for the BigFile, providing live information and statistics about the network, governance, and the BIG utility token, including account and transaction information.

name: Uniswap Frontend on BIG
description: Uniswap's frontend hosted on the BigFile with canister-based wallet integration. Thanks to the BigFile, traditional DeFi solutions can now be completely decentralized, having their frontend hosted on BIG. There is no longer a need to include centralized cloud providers in a decentralized application.
oneLiner: Front-End On-Chain

name: Bink
oneLiner: Superior alternative to Linktree
description: Connect, engage and inspire your audience while owning your data and your identity.

name: ICPulse
oneLiner: Visual metrics for BIG's software activity data
description: ICPulse increases the transparency on ICP’s developer ecosystem by aggregating the activity data from GitHub and displaying visual metrics in an effective dashboard.

name: Cube Store
oneLiner: Empowering Users to Easily Deploy Cubes on the BigFile
description: Cube Store is a groundbreaking platform that empowers developers/users in the BigFile ecosystem and beyond. With its innovative self-deploy feature, users can effortlessly access and deploy cubes, including pre-built images such as Tokens, NFTs, dapps, and various other tools.

name: BigFile Dashboard
description: The BigFile Association maintains a public dashboard where anyone can track the latest statistics for the BigFile blockchain. Tracking everything from blocks per second, to NNS proposals and their information and voting record, as well the latest state of the network, and transaction data.
oneLiner: BigFile Official Dashboard

name: BigFile website
oneLiner: Educational website for the BigFile
description: The website you're scrolling now, thebigfile.org is itself a dapp hosted 100% on the BigFile - including images and videos.

name: BIG HUB
oneLiner: Your gateway to web3 apps: connect, chat and explore all in one place
description: Welcome to BIG Hub! Your dapp for connecting with friends, chatting, joining groups, and managing tokens & NFTs. For developers, register your projects easily without seeking permission. Empowering you to connect, transact, and build in a user-friendly ecosystem.

name: Isotopic Game Store
description: A new, Open and Cross-Platform Game Store, where games become ownable assets that can be traded, lent, resold, or otherwise repurposed. Find unlimited games that can be browsed, downloaded, and played, on the Isotopic Game Store.
oneLiner: The first Decentralized & Cross-Platform Game Store.

name: BIG Explorer
description: BIG Explorer is a Block Explorer and Analytics Platform for BigFile, a decentralized smart contracts platform.
oneLiner: Block Explorer for BigFile

name: BIGgpt
oneLiner: A fun dApp to demonstrate on-chain LLMs
description: A llama2 LLM, trained on the tiny Stories dataset is running in a cube. You can interact with it via a ChatGPT style frontend, served from an BIG cube. You provide the start of a story as the prompt, and the LLM will generate a tiny story.

name: BIGGhost
oneLiner: The First Decentralized Meme Coin on BIG
description: The First Decentralized Meme Coin on BIG

name: RentSpace
oneLiner: A property rental platform that enables tenants to pay fees and rent in either cryptocurrency or traditional money.
description: A property rental platform that enables tenants to pay fees and rent in either cryptocurrency or traditional money.

name: BIGEx
oneLiner: Decentralized exchange built entirely on the chain based on the BIG.
description: Decentralized exchange built entirely on the chain based on the BIG.

name: BIG Footprint
oneLiner: A blockchain ESG platform that tracks BIG environmental metrics and provides tooling to reduce the environmental impact of the network.
description: A blockchain ESG platform that tracks BIG environmental metrics and provides tooling to reduce the environmental impact of the network.
